    read*, N, x
    allocate(srime(N))
    read*, srime

    allocate(cost(N,N))
    allocate(result(N))

    ! Initialize cost array
    do i =1, N
        cost(i,1) = srime(i)
        do castNum =2, N
            temp = mod(i - castNum, N)
            other = temp +1
            cost(i, castNum) = min( cost(i, castNum-1), srime(other) )
        end do
    end do

    ! Compute result array
    do i=1, N
        result(i) = (i-1)*x
        do j=1, N
            result(i) = result(i) + cost(j,i)
        end do
    end do

    ! Find the minimum value
    min_val = result(1) do i=2, N
        if (result(i) < min_val) then
            min_val = result(i)
        end if
    end do

    ! Convert min_val to string
    write(str_min, '(I0)') min_val
    str_min = adjustl(str_min)
    s = str_min
    L = len_trim(s)

    ! Second part: process the string s
    allocate(dp(0:L, 0:12))
    dp = 0
    dp(0,0) = 1
    base =1

    do i=1, L
        character(len=1) :: current_char
        current_char = s(L -i +1) if (current_char == '?') then
            do pre=0,12
                do next_digit=0,9
                    new_pre = mod( base * next_digit + pre, 13 )
                    dp(i, new_pre) = dp(i, new_pre) + dp(i-1, pre)
                    dp(i, new_pre) = mod( dp(i, new_pre), MOD )
                end do
            end do
        else
            next_digit = ichar(current_char) - ichar('0')
            do pre=0,12
                new_pre = mod( base * next_digit + pre, 13 )
                dp(i, new_pre) = dp(i, new_pre) + dp(i-1, pre)
                dp(i, new_pre) = mod( dp(i, new_pre), MOD )
            end do
        end if
        base = mod( base *10, 13 )
    end do

    print*, dp(L,5)

    deallocate(srime, cost, result, dp)

end program main

program main
    implicit none
    integer :: N, x, i, j, castNum, other, temp, min_val, L
    integer*8 :: MOD = 1000000007
    integer, allocatable :: srime(:)
    integer*8, allocatable :: cost(:,:), result(:)
    character(len=20) :: str_min
    character(len=20) :: s
    integer*8, allocatable :: dp(:,:)
    integer :: base, next_digit, new_pre, pre

    ! First part: read input and compute minimum
    read*, N, x
    allocate(srime(N))
    read*, srime

    allocate(cost(N,N))
    allocate(result(N))

    ! Initialize cost array
    do i =1, N
        cost(i,1) = srime(i)
        do castNum =2, N
            temp = mod(i - castNum, N)
            other = temp +1
            cost(i, castNum) = min( cost(i, castNum-1), srime(other) )
        end do
    end do

    ! Compute result array
    do i=1, N
        result(i) = (i-1)*x
        do j=1, N
            result(i) = result(i) + cost(j,i)
        end do
    end do

    ! Find the minimum value
    min_val = result(1)
    do i=2, N
        if (result(i) < min_val) then
            min_val = result(i)
        end if
    end do

    ! Convert min_val to string
    write(str_min, '(I0)') min_val
    str_min = adjustl(str_min)
    s = str_min
    L = len_trim(s)

    ! Second part: process the string s
    allocate(dp(0:L, 0:12))
    dp = 0
    dp(0,0) = 1
    base =1

    do i=1, L
        character(len=1) :: current_char
        current_char = s(L -i +1)
        if (current_char == '?') then
            do pre=0,12
                do next_digit=0,9
                    new_pre = mod( base * next_digit + pre, 13 )
                    dp(i, new_pre) = dp(i, new_pre) + dp(i-1, pre)
                    dp(i, new_pre) = mod( dp(i, new_pre), MOD )
                end do
            end do
        else
            next_digit = ichar(current_char) - ichar('0')
            do pre=0,12
                new_pre = mod( base * next_digit + pre, 13 )
                dp(i, new_pre) = dp(i, new_pre) + dp(i-1, pre)
                dp(i, new_pre) = mod( dp(i, new_pre), MOD )
            end do
        end if
        base = mod( base *10, 13 )
    end do

    print*, dp(L,5)

    deallocate(srime, cost, result, dp)

end program main
